CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Bush touts immigration deal that divides, unites all sides

05/19/07 10:11 AM, EDT
Thankful for a breakthrough, President Bush on Saturday praised senators of both parties for delivering a potential deal to overhaul U.S. immigration policy.
